description: The six-vehicle crash in Tampines on April 22 has sadness and anger echoing through the nation. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: It’s simple - slow down to save lives
title_page: It’s simple – slow down to save lives | The Straits Times
maintext:
For many parents and kids, there’s something precious about that daily commute to school, despite the early rush, despite the congestion.
That small window, before the grind of the day sets in, is exclusively for the child – whether in a car laughing loudly, on a bicycle nestled snugly, or by foot, hands held tightly.
